IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: THE MISSION OF COASTAL MAINE BOTANICAL GARDENS IS TO PROTECT, PRESERVE, AND ENHANCE THE BOTANICAL HERITAGE AND NATURAL LANDSCAPES OF COASTAL MAINE FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES THROUGH HORTICULTURE, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MISSION OF COASTAL MAINE BOTANICAL GARDENS IS TO PROTECT, PRESERVE, AND ENHANCE THE BOTANICAL HERITAGE AND NATURAL LANDSCAPES OF COASTAL MAINE FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES THROUGH HORTICULTURE, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH.
IRS990.Description: SEE SCHEDULE O MISSION THE MISSION OF COASTAL MAINE BOTANICAL GARDENS IS TO PROTECT, PRESERVE, AND ENHANCE THE BOTANICAL HERITAGE AND NATURAL LANDSCAPES OF COASTAL MAINE FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES THROUGH HORTICULTURE, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH. VALUES EXCELLENCE AMONG THE GARDENS OF THE WORLD RESPECT FOR THE ENVIRONMENT AND CONSERVATION OF OUR COASTAL PROPERTY ACCESSIBILITY MAKING A GARDEN EXPERIENCE AVAILABLE TO ALL LASTING FINANCIAL STRENGTH A PASSION TO SHARE THE INSPIRATION, SERENITY, TRANQUILITY, AND THE AESTHETICISM OF MAINES COASTAL NATURAL EXPERIENCE PROVIDE OPPORTUNITIES FOR LIFE LONG LEARNING COASTAL MAINE BOTANICAL GARDENS (CMBG) WAS FOUNDED IN 1991 WITH THE MISSION TO PROTECT AND SHOWCASE THE BOTANICAL HERITAGE OF COASTAL MAINE,DEMONSTRATE SUSTAINABLE AND ECOLOGICALLY RESPONSIBLE GARDENING PRACTICES AND FOSTER STEWARDSHIP OF THE ENVIRONMENT. AFTER YEARS OF CAREFUL PLANNING, CMBG OFFICIALLY OPENED IN 2007 AS MAINES FIRST MAJOR BOTANICAL GARDEN. IT IS THE LARGEST PUBLIC GARDEN IN NORTHERN NEW ENGLAND WITH 248-ACRES INCLUDING TEN DEVELOPED ACRES OF ORNAMENTAL GARDENS, WOODLAND TRAILS, AND VISITOR FACILITIES. SINCE ITS GRAND OPENING CMBG HAS OFFERED EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS COVERING PLANT SCIENCE, GARDENING, BOTANICAL ARTS AND ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION. IT HAS ALSO EXPANDED ITS WOODLAND TRAILS AND DEVELOPED AN ADDITIONAL FIVE ACRES WITH TWO PREMIER SPECIALTY GARDENS. IN 2011 CMBG WILL OPEN A LEED PLATINUM NET ZERO EDUCATION CENTER CONTAINING THREE LARGE CLASSROOMS CAPABLE OF CONVERTING TO A SINGLE 175 PERSON AUDITORIUM. ANNUAL ADMISSIONS HAVE DOUBLED REACHING 87,790 IN 2010 AND MEMBERSHIP HAS REACHED 4,238. THE REGIONAL ECONOMIC CONTRIBUTION OF CMBG DETERMINED BY THE UNIVERSITY OF MAINE ECONOMICS DEPARTMENT WAS ESTIMATED AT 8.24 MILLION IN 2010.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Identifier: COLLECTIONS AND RELATION TO EXEMPT PURPOSE
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART III, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: OTHER ASSETS CONSIST PRIMARILY OF WORKS OF ART AND SIMILAR ASSETS, WHICH ARE STATED AT COST OR, IF ACQUIRED BY GIFT, AT THE APPRAISED VALUE AT THE DATE OF THE GIFT.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: IT IS THE ORGANIZATIONS LONG TERM PLAN TO GROW ITS ENDOWMENT FUND TO APPROXIMATELY FIVE TIMES ANNUAL CASH OPERATING COSTS. DISTRIBUTIONS FROM THE ENDOWMENT TO BE USED IN OPERATIONS ARE CALCULATED AT APPROXIMATELY 4% OF A TWELVE QUARTER RUNNING AVERAGE OF ENDOWMENT INVESTMENTS.
THE ORGANIZATIONS FEDERAL RETURN OF ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX FOR 2010, 2009, AND 2008 ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE IRS, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY WERE FILED.

Form990ScheduleMPartII.Explanation: IN-KIND DONATIONS ARE RECEIVED AND THEN SOLD AT THE ANNUAL AUCTION.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MISSION THE MISSION OF COASTAL MAINE BOTANICAL GARDENS IS TO PROTECT, PRESERVE, AND ENHANCE THE BOTANICAL HERITAGE AND NATURAL LANDSCAPES OF COASTAL MAINE FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES THROUGH HORTICULTURE, EDUCATION AND RESEARCH. IT HAS ALSO EXPANDED ITS WOODLAND TRAILS AND DEVELOPED AN ADDITIONAL FIVE ACRES WITH TWO PREMIER SPECIALTY GARDENS. IN 2011 CMBG WILL OPEN A LEED PLATINUM NET ZERO EDUCATION CENTER CONTAINING THREE LARGE CLASSROOMS CAPABLE OF CONVERTING TO A SINGLE 175 PERSON AUDITORIUM. THE REGIONAL ECONOMIC CONTRIBUTION OF CMBG DETERMINED BY THE UNIVERSITY OF MAINE ECONOMICS DEPARTMENT WAS ESTIMATED AT 8.24 MILLION IN 2010.
JOHN R. GILES SARAH H. GILES PRESIDENT DIRECTOR HUSBAND / WIFE

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FINANCE AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEW THE 990, WHICH IS THEN PROVIDED TO THE GOVERNING BOARD BEFORE IT IS FILED.

EACH BOARD MEMBER COMPLETES A CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE ANNUALLY, AND ANY CONFLICTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE MEMBERS OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE, WHO MAKE A RECOMMENDATION ON THEIR FINDINGS TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.
THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ANNUALLY, LOOKING AT COMPARABLE DATA FROM THREE SOURCES, WHICH IS SUBSTANTIATED.
ANNUAL EVALUATIONS OF TOP MANAGEMENT ARE PERFORMED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE HELD IN THE OFFICE AND ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC DURING STANDARD BUSINESS HOURS. THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE GARDENS' WEBSITE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: OTHER CHANGES IN NET ASSETS EXPLANATION
